page.title: 06LOCAL VILLAGE HALLS
page.content:
Coningsby and Tattershall village hall each have one caretaker.{They have {bingo,discos,dances,wedding receptions {and private parties and jumble sales Both halls are run by management committees and can be hired privately. They both have heating and hold fund raising events to pay for it.
{Coningsby Hall started in 1910 as a {Temperance Hall and was extended in {1974 and has old peoples' sessions.
Tattershall Village Hall started life as a chicken hut and was erected in the mid 1940's. It was extended between 1982/1983.It cost Â£16,000 to rebuild.The Committee raised a third of the money.The Parish Council gave the rest of the money.
